itemInfo.itemDesc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Copper and Tin together. It requires the knowledge of Heating: Beginner.

※ Find Flaviano in Heidel and complete the Pure Water for an Experiment Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Apprentice Level 4 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Melted Copper Shard
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Copper Ore.

item.name: Melted Tin Shard
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Tin Ore.

item.name: Melted Copper Shard
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Copper Ore.

item.name: Melted Tin Shard
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Tin Ore.

item.name: Fishing Boat Cargo Container
item.desc:
A freight chest that can be attached to a fishing boat. It allows the boat to hold heavier cargo when equipped.
When 3 or more set items are equipped:
Movement Speed +2%
All DP +30
- Mounts Usable: Fishing Boat
It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).

item.name: Calpheon Ferry Cargo Container
item.desc:
A Calpheon freight chest that can be attached to a ferry. It allows the boat to hold heavier cargo when equipped.
When 3 or more set items are equipped:
Movement Speed +2%
Weight Limit +100LT
- Mounts Usable: Ferry
It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).

item.name: Sharp Fluid Collector
item.desc: A Gathering Tool made for extracting animal blood or sap.\n- Gathering Time: - 4 sec \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.desc: A Gathering Tool used to help cut wood efficiently.\n- Gathering Time: - 4 sec \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.desc: A Gathering Tool made for extracting ore and minerals from rock.\n- Gathering Time: - 4 sec \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.name: Bronze Hoe
item.desc: A Gathering Tool used to harvest wild herbs and crops.\n- Gathering Time: - 4 sec \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.name: Wagon Registration: Flimsy Wagon
item.desc:
Proof of ownership of a <Flimsy Wagon>, allowing you to access it at a Stable.
- Inventory Slot(s): 6, Acceleration: 100%, Speed: 100%, Turn: 100%, Braking: 100%
It can be used after reaching Lv.8.

※ Using a Wagon License
 1. Right-click the Wagon License and move to the designated Stable.
 2. Talk to the Stable Keeper and select the Stable menu.
 3. Click on the Register Emblem menu and right-click on the Wagon License.
 4. Enter the Wagon’s name and select Confirm to register the Wagon.
 5. Select the registered Wagon and click on the Find menu.

item.name: Wagon Registration: Shabby Wagon
item.desc:
Proof of ownership of a <Shabby Wagon>, allowing you to access it at a Stable.
- Inventory Slot(s): 8, Acceleration: 110%, Speed: 110%, Turn: 120%, Braking: 120%
It can be used after reaching Lv.8.

※ Using a Wagon License
 1. Right-click the Wagon License and move to the designated Stable.
 2. Talk to the Stable Keeper and select the Stable menu.
 3. Click on the Register Emblem menu and right-click on the Wagon License.
 4. Enter the Wagon’s name and select Confirm to register the Wagon.
 5. Select the registered Wagon and click on the Find menu.

item.name: Bronze Ingot Crate
item.desc: A Trade Item containing 10 Bronze Ingots.

item.desc:
A cover for a four-wheeled wagon.

- Can be Installed on: Four-Wheeled Wagon

It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).

item.name: Shabby Wagon Cover
item.desc:
A cover for a wagon.

- Can be Installed on: Wagon

It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).

item.name: Ship License: Fishing Boat
item.desc:
Proof of ownership of a <Fishing Boat> at the Wharf.
- Inventory Slot(s): 12, Acceleration: 100%, Speed: 100%, Turn: 100%, Braking: 100%
It can be used after reaching Lv.8.

※ Using a Ship License
 1. Right-click the Ship License and move to the designated Wharf.
 2. Talk to the Ferry Crossing Keeper and select the Wharf menu.
 3. Click on the Register Ship menu and right-click on the Ship License.
 4. Enter the ship’s name and push Confirm to register the ship.
 5. Select the registered ship and click on the Find menu.
